headline: Workday, Inc. (WDAY): Among Tiger Global Management’s Long-Term Stock Picks
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Tiger Global’s 15 Long-Term Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) stands against the other stock picks. Even as the venture capital efforts of Tiger Global Management come under increased scrutiny on the back of reportedly disappointing post-pandemic performance, […]
